title: Pride and Place: An LGBTQ+ Exhibition
description:
Please join us at the Museum of Cambridge for the opening celebration of our upcoming community curated exhibition which explores LGBTQ+ lives in the city.

We have a limited capacity so please remember to R.S.V.P with the number of guests you will be bringing – we want to make sure you can all get in!

RSVP to capturingcambridge@museumofcambridge.org.uk
